mapper.insert: insert into users (userNum, userID, userPW, userName, userGender, userBirth, userPhone, userEmail) values (user_counter.nextval, #{userID}, #{userPW}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select userNum, userID, userPW from users where userID=#{userID} and userPW=#{userPW}
select userID from users where userID=#{userID}
select count(*) from users where userID = #{ userID }
select userID, userPW from users where userName=#{userName} and userPhone=#{userPhone}
mapper.update: update users set userPW = #{userPW}, userName = #{userName}, userGender = #{userGender}, userBirth = #{userBirth}, userPhone = #{userPhone}, userEmail = #{userEmail} where userNum = #{userNum}
mapper.select: select * from users where userNum > 1 order by userNum desc
